Class Insertion

    Java implementation of Insertion Sort, referenced from Algorithmss 4th edition by Robert Sedgewick and Kevin Wayne

    1.0
    Author:

      • isSorted

        public static boolean isSorted​(java.lang.Comparable[] a)
        A helper function to determine if array is sorted, for testing
        Parameters:
        a - An array of comparable objects
        Returns:
        true if array is sorted (higher sales to lower sales), false otherwise
